    Projects

    WRLD

    An affordable bipedal droid for testing reinforcement learning-based control and computer vision models

    Zap'Em Blast'Em Robots

    An interactive, laser-shooting game bootlegged off Rock'Em Sock'Em Robots

    spring2wing

    Jumping robot with wings (doesn't fly yet)

    D.O.M.

    A weightlifting prosthetic for a Cal Poly Wrestler

    Line-following, Orientation Sensing Romi Robot

    My ME-405 term project using the Romi robot to complete a course 'autonomously'

    Intro to Reinforcement Learning

    Model development using TensorFlow in preparation for my thesis

    Tarantula Robot

    2 DoF tarantula robot with lifting mechanism and leg sweeping
